text.headline: Countries enacting higher-spec mask laws/rules in 2021
text.text: Some countries realized surgical masks only 50% protection, and cloth face coverings as lower protection still. With this realization mandates for higher filtration masks were enacted.

text.headline: Germany: Bavaria orders compulsory FFP2 masks on public transport and in shops
text.text: From next Monday, people in Bavaria will have to wear FFP2 mouth and nose coverings while travelling on public transport and when in shops. State premier Markus Söder, of Angela Merkel's CDU sister party the Christian Social Union (CSU), announced the changes after a cabinet meeting in Munich on Tuesday. Söder said that the "normal community masks" were for the protection of others during the pandemic. FFP2 masks, which are available in pharmacies, also protect the wearer. See also Süddeutsche Zeitung Die Zeit articles in German
